name: Snacktime!
description:
In a city in a not so distant future, you're an automated snack vendor minding your own business. Life is good, and you have a steady stream of customers every day... Or so you thought.

One day rumors of a more effective snack vendor machine replacing you reach your... errr, gears? Your whole life is under threat! It's time to take matters into your own hands and show the decision makers of this city just how effective and important you can be! 

The people need their snacks... and it's your mission to deliver!

CONTROLS

WASD to move
Left click to shoot
Right click to zoom in
Mouse wheel to change snacks
CREDITS

Taisto Saromäki - 3D, level design

Petteri Alanen - Coding, animation

Some sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com.
